title: Tech of Representation
description: Explores historical, cultural, and theoretical issues related by technologies of representation, including written, spoken, and gestural languages; print, painting and illustration; still and moving photography; recorded sound; and computer mediated communications and interactive digital media.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ENGL 1102 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
